title: Allow redundant bans!
body: If you're gonna kick people from champ select for not banning a champion, you should let them ban champions that your team has already banned. Twice now, while I wasn't AFK, fully in lobby, trying to ban a champion, I didn't realise my teammate had already banned the champ, because for some reason the client's super super laggy for me, so when it doesn't show up as being banned it looks like it's just lagging like normal, and besides, it takes ages for me to search the champion I want to ban. Anyway, twice now I've been kicked from a lobby because a team member already banned the champ I want to ban, and it's annoying. I get the annoying "Oh you queue dodged you have to wait!" thingy when I didn't even mean to queue dodge! >:( It's so annoying! Please allow redundant bans! (Also for people who aren't paying attention and quickly ban their go to ban and barely get it but get cock blocked and kicked from the lobby.) {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: Yeah i've ran into this issue a few times before, because it takes about 5-10 seconds to select and ban a champion due to client lag, and it's just terrible when your forced to try and pick or ban something when the timer is on the low end.
Yessss!!!! Vindication!!!! I'm not the only one with this problem! {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

To the board members, I am not happy of banning me unnessarily when our storm and power went out just for that and banned me for 20 lousy minutes. You should have a site that you can see how people gone off from power and accident instead of keep up that stupid banning including innocent players
